response.overview: The story follows a struggling working-class man who comes home each day to a wife who deliberately keeps her distance, playing on his emotions but never letting him get close. Over time, her behavior escalates until she divorces him, leaving him heartbroken and desperate as she uses the children to punish him, making every attempt to see them a painful struggle.
response.tagline: "A man’s fight for his children begins at home."
response.title: Al-Nemrah
